type.markdownDescription:
### `apoli:damage_over_time`
Inflicts damage on the entity that has the power from a specified damage source within the specified interval.
## Power Type
Power Types are what grants functionality to your origins! Each power has a type, specified with a type field in the JSON. Which type a power is defines which other fields it requires and supports.

[Power Type Documentation](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/json/power/)

interval.description: Duration of ticks to wait between the damage.

onset_delay.description: How many ticks the power has to be active in order to apply the first damage. If not set, this will be equal to interval.

damage.description: How much damage will be dealt each interval.

damage_easy.description: How much damage will be dealt each interval on Easy difficulty. If not set, this will be equal to damage.

damage_source.description: If set, this is the damage source that will be used to deal the damage.

protection_enchantment.description: If set, the total amount of levels of this enchantment will be counted on the player's armor to increase the onset_delay.

protection_effectiveness.description: If protection_enchantment is set, this multiplier scales how effective it will be (1.0 = time the onset_delay is increased is the same as with Hydrophobia and Water Protection).
